title: A King Legitimate and Illegitimate
itunes:title: A King Legitimate and Illegitimate
description:
In a small town in the northeast of Spain, in a small pub, a man named Albert Solà works as a waiter. He might also be the rightful King of Spain.


Support Noble Blood:

— Bonus episodes and scripts on Patreon

— Merch!

— Pre-order Dana's book, Anatomy: A Love Story

— Sign up to join Dana on the Mary Shelley Pilgrimage in April

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
